alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cherry County through 345 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Medicine Lake, or 37 miles southeast of Martin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cody, Kilgore, Nenzel, Crookston, Steer Creek Campground, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Schoolhouse Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 157 and 186. Highway 97 between mile markers 121 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
